amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the amount of backlogged projects to be de-authorized, beyond what is initially de-authorized in the bill from $12 billion to $35 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bentivolio amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bentivolio amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Bentivolio.
